article_title: PPACA boosting fortunes of major hospital owners
article_text:
Photo: Getty Images

While some major insurers continue to raise questions about whether they can make money selling coverage via the Obamacare exchanges, large hospital systems say they are reaping the benefits of increased health coverage.

As reported by Forbes, two major hospital system operators reported strong surges in hospital admissions this year compared to last. And last year’s numbers were higher than in past years.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Dan Cook
article_metadata.description: Two major hospital system operators reported higher numbers of in-hospital admissions this year compared to last.
